title: Icaro Tech Listed as a Representative Vendor in Gartners Market Guide for I&O Business Value Dashboards
text:
Icaro Tech today announced that it has been identified as a representative vendor in the Gartner "Market Guide for I&O Business Value Dashboards” report. Icaro Tech was named as a vendor providing business value dashboards for the intelligence and operations infrastructure.
Miami, FL (PRWEB) September 24, 2015
Icaro Tech, which empowers intelligent operations through dashboards and analytics software, today announced that it has been identified as a representative vendor in the Gartner "Market Guide for I&O Business Value Dashboards” report*. Icaro Tech was named as a vendor providing business value dashboards for the intelligence and operations infrastructure.
“The market of I&O business value dashboards is brand new and our focus as a player in this market is to provide companies with a view of their infrastructure, operations and services that allows for a deeper dive into business opportunities,” said Kleber Stroeh, CTO and co-founder of Icaro Tech. “We believe that being included in this Gartner report solidifies our place as one of the relevant players in this world.”
Icaro Tech uses the power of data, information and technology to deliver solutions for intelligent operations. CIOs and COOs are faced with a staggering volume of data that can provide information about hidden risks and opportunities for their business, but they do not have an efficient means to analyze it. These executives need a means to extract data from organizational systems and utilize analytics to transform it into actionable information that provides the insight they need to benefit the business.
Icaro Tech’s Advanced Dashboards and Dash Analytics fit this business need. Currently in use by enterprises in multiple industries, including telecommunications and financial services, the solutions connect data from disparate systems and present it in multi-layered control panels to allow intelligence and operations professionals access to information that is visible and actionable. By utilizing business intelligence and deep machine learning to uncover bottlenecks, inefficiencies and areas of improvement, Icaro Tech’s solutions provide insights to help change the way that companies operate.
Gartner “Market Guide for I&O Business Value Dashboards” by Gary Spivak, Robert Naegle, May 21, 2015.

About Icaro Tech
Icaro Tech’s mission is to bring intelligence to operations that support the global village. The company employs technologies, products and services to create knowledge and deliver processes automation and optimization for business areas including utilities, IT operations, telecommunications and financials. It seeks to provide to humanity means to operate in a more sustainable and socially responsible manner.
The Icaro Tech team believes that knowledge and technology applied to operational improvement will lead to a better life. Less waste will lead to more wealth and less hunger. More efficiency will lead to more leisure and more creativity. For more information, visit http://www.icarotech.com .
